scripts.build: node -e "console.log('Current working directory:', process.cwd())" && mkdir -p $(pwd)/../../apps/static/labs/space-shooter && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir $(pwd)/../../apps/static/labs/space-shooter --public-url /labs/space-shooter/ --no-cache --no-content-hash --no-source-maps && cp -r public/* $(pwd)/../../apps/static/labs/space-shooter/
